name: 吳昭正
objective:
This course covers the fundamental of the following topics:
1. Computer Hardware and Software
2. Computer Networking
3. Software Engineering
4. Database Systems
5. Artificial Intelligence
6. Theory of Computation
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Data Storage (I)
Week 3. Data Manipulation (II)
Week 4. Operating Systems (I)
Week 5. Operating Systems (II)
Week 6. Networking and the Internet (I)
Week 7. Networking and the Internet (II)
Week 8. Algorithms
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Programming Languages (I)
Week 11. Programming Languages (II)
Week 12. Software Engineering 
Week 13. Data Abstractions
Week 14. Database Systems
Week 15. Computer Graphics
Week 16. Artificial Intelligence
Week 17. Theory of Computation
Week 18. Final Exam
materials: Textbook:Computer Science: An Overview, 10th ed., by J. Glenn Brookshear, Pearson, 2008
